name: Maze of the Mini-taur
description:
ENTRY FOR THE GMTK GAME JAM 2021
_________________________________________________

Welcome to the Maze of the Mini-taur! Make your way through the labyrinth while you manipulate its very rooms. Can you escape?

In this puzzle-platformer, each level is made up of 9 joined together rooms. Shift the columns and rows of the level to separate and rejoin the various rooms, to create new (and perilous) paths for your Mini-taur to reach the exit. Good luck!

_________________________________________________

CONTROLS:

WASD / Arrow keys – Move and jump
Left click – Move maze columns/rows
R – Reset level
O / P – Previous level / skip level

_________________________________________________

CREDITS:

Leko – Programmer
Kira – Programmer, Level Designer
